original_text: she caught him by his garment, saying, “Lie with me.” But he left his garment in her hand and fled and got out of the house.
korean_text: 그 여인이 그의 옷을 잡고 이르되 나와 동침하자 그러나 요셉이 자기의 옷을 그 여인의 손에 버려두고 밖으로 나가매

sentences.original_text: she caught him by his garment
But he left his garment in her hand
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 그의 옷을 그녀의 손에 두고 떠났다

sentences.original_text: and fled and got out of the house
